select a.*, b.username as createUser, c.username as updateUser from sys_role a left join sys_user b on a.create_by = b.id left join sys_user c on a.update_by = b.id
where 1= 1
and a.name like concat( #{name}, '%')
limit #{startNum},#{pageSize}

where 1= 1
